value.halfverse: a very present help in trouble.
value.verse: God is our refuge and strength, *
Therefore we will not fear, though the earth be moved, *
value.halfverse: and though the mountains be toppled into the depths of the sea;
and though the mountains tremble at its tumult.
value.verse: Though its waters rage and foam, *

value.halfverse: the God of Jacob is our stronghold.
value.verse: The LORD of hosts is with us; *
There is a river whose streams make glad the city of God, *
value.halfverse: the holy habitation of the Most High.
God shall help her at the break of day.
value.verse:
God is in the midst of her;
she shall not be overthrown; *

value.halfverse: God has spoken, and the earth shall melt away.
value.verse: The nations make much ado, and the kingdoms are shaken; *
The LORD of hosts is with us; *
value.halfverse: the God of Jacob is our stronghold.

value.verse: Come now and look upon the works of the LORD, *
value.halfverse: what awesome things he has done on earth.

value.verse: It is he who makes war to cease in all the world; *
value.halfverse:
he breaks the bow, and shatters the spear,
 and burns the shields with fire.

value.verse: “Be still, then, and know that I am God; *
value.halfverse:
I will be exalted among the nations;
 I will be exalted in the earth.”
the God of Jacob is our stronghold.
value.verse: The LORD of hosts is with us; *
